description: A little child wakes up to a cloudy morning and feels sad, but decides to help anyway. By caring for a small bird and watering a drooping flower, the garden feels happierâ€”and the sun comes out, showing that small acts of kindness can brighten the day.
name: Shares The Light

pages.description: The child sees a cloudy morning, feels sad, and decides to help.
pages.story_text: {name} woke up and looked outside.The sky was gray. The sun was hiding.{name} felt a little sad.Then {they} said, 'I can try to help.'{name} put on {their} blue hoodie, green shorts, striped socks, and yellow rain boots, and went outside.

pages.description: The child helps a cold, quiet bird feel better.
pages.story_text: In the garden, {name} saw a small bird.The bird looked cold and quiet.{name} gently said, 'Hi, little bird.'{they} picked up a soft leaf and made a tiny blanket near the nest.The bird blinked and chirped, 'Cheep!'

pages.description: The child waters a drooping flower, and it stands up again.
pages.story_text: {name} walked a little more.A flower was drooping down.{name} whispered, 'You can stand up.'{they} poured a little water near the flower.The flower lifted its head, like it was smiling.

pages.description: The child waves at the sky, and the sun comes back; helping makes the day feel happy.
pages.story_text: {name} looked up at the sky and waved.{they} said, 'Sun, please come back. We are helping today!'The clouds slowly moved away.A warm, bright sun peeked out.{name} smiled and said, 'When I help, the day feels happy.'

cover_text.text: Small help can make a big smile.
